message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $6000, you get $4000.  It's in our best interest to settle this quickly.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more balanced split.  Let's settle this now and avoid further losses due to inflation.
Bob, time is money, literally! Let's meet in the middle. This offer is better than what we'll both get if we wait any longer.
